DESCRIPTION: Configures the Auto-Addon Anti-External Links module.
LINKS1: Oops! You must enter days in **Numbers**. Example: `20`
LINKS2:
Oops! The module option must be between 0-3.
0 = disable
1 = delete message
2 = apply a warning to the user
3 = both (1 & 2)
LINKS3: `[AUTO-MOD]` Anti-External Links was successfully set to **{{args}}**.
